name: TDC Connect
description:
iOS version submitted to App Store...

TDC is a new way to maximize your networking at all possible GDC events across all the parallel universes. 

Meet people who don't exist in this universe, but may in another. Have holographic boba tea with them. Connect interdimensionally! Powered by VIBRANT DARK MATTER. 

How many people beyond our known world will you meet today? Don't worry - this high score is just from participants in this universe. 

---

Note: Any references to historical events, real people, or real locales are used fictitiously. Other names, characters, places, and incidents are the product of the author's imagination (StyleGAN and gpt-2), and any resemblance to actual events or locales or persons, living or dead, is entirely coincidental.

Created for the #NotGDC Game Jam 2019! https://itch.io/jam/notgdcjam2019
